Together, we can create some­thing

Hi, I’m Alec Lomas.

I’m a graphic & web designer from Phoenix, Arizona.

My passion is design. I get joy from creating beautiful, useful, and engaging products regardless of medium.

I love solving problems, and coding is just another extension of that. I’m well-versed in the worlds of HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

Juggling & unicycling are not in my repetoire. Neither is saying “I can’t”, so I can totally juggle & unicycle. At the same time.
